name: Gigantropolis
description:
W A S D to move

Left click to use

1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 to equip (if unlocked)

Arrow underneath means selected

Space to interact (if this is showing)

Continue pressing space in conversations to read the next line

F1 to die (if you get stuck)

When you die you leave half your resources in your soul

Press space next to it to recover

Build up alliances and gather upgrades and abilities to stop Gigantimus and save the city

STATS:

Shows at bottom of the screen when in gameplay

Left top: Ammo (didnt end up using)

Middle top: Current Health

Right top: Scrap (Currency)

Left bottom: Buof level

Middle bottom: Max Health

Right bottom: Lick power level

WEAPONS:

Pipe

Pistol

Rocket Jump

Ball

Grapple

Vacuum

Skull (Ran out of time not in game)

Level up

Health:

Adds +10 max hp

Buof:

Adds percentage chance to spawn buoff on hit (doesnt work atm)

Lips:

The mental damage you inflict by licking your lips is significantly increased

---

There will probably be bugs, ill keep trying to hunt them down, sorry if you encounter any.

---

Goob bye, and goob luck!
